td6.view

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.view.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompoundFigure, SimpleFigure

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract figure that can be manipulated and drawn on a frame.
    Invariants :
    getWidth() >= 0 && getHeight() >= 0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Figure()
      Initialize the figure default properties
      Figure(int width, int height, int x, int y)
      Initialize the figure properties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void draw()
      Draw the figure with the current properties on the canvas.
      abstract void erase()
      Erase the current figure from the canvas.
      int getHeight()
      Give the height of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
      int getWidth()
      Give the width of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
      int getX()
      Give the x location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
      int getY()
      Give the y location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
      protected boolean intersects(Figure figure)
      Check whether the current figure and the given figure bounding rectangles have common points
      protected void invariant()
      Check the class invariant
      protected boolean isInside()
      Check whether the figure bounding rectangle is inside the canvas
      void move()
      Move the figure in an autonomous way (i.e. the dx and dy moves are chosen by the object itself)
      void move(int dx, int dy)
      Change the location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Figure

        public Figure()
        Initialize the figure default properties

      • Figure

        public Figure(int width,
              int height,
              int x,
              int y)
        Initialize the figure properties
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        height - the height of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        x - the x location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        y - the y location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        Preconditions :
        width >= 0 && height >= 0

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw()
        Draw the figure with the current properties on the canvas.

      • erase

        public abstract void erase()
        Erase the current figure from the canvas.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Give the width of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        Returns:
        the figure width

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Give the height of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        Returns:
        the figure height

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Give the x location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        Returns:
        the figure x location

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Give the y location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle in pixels
        Returns:
        the figure y location

      • isInside

        protected boolean isInside()
        Check whether the figure bounding rectangle is inside the canvas
        Returns:
        true if the figure is inside the canvas

      • intersects

        protected boolean intersects(Figure figure)
        Check whether the current figure and the given figure bounding rectangles have common points
        Returns:
        true if the figures have a non empty intersection

      • move

        public void move(int dx,
                 int dy)
        Change the location of the upper left corner of the figure bounding rectangle
        Parameters:
        dx - number of pixels to move the figure to the right (dx>0) or left (dx<0)
        dy - number of pixels to move the figure to the bottom (dy>0) or top (dy<0)

      • move

        public void move()
        Move the figure in an autonomous way (i.e. the dx and dy moves are chosen by the object itself)

      • invariant

        protected final void invariant()
        Check the class invariant
